description: Mahindra has delivered quality for years and this car is no exception. This Mahindra Bolero Truck  2015  has travelled a total of 25000km and features a Manual transmission system as well as other great features. Priced at Rs.1530000, this car is fantastic value for money. Don’t forget to mention Carmudi when you contact the seller!
name: Mahindra Bolero Truck  2015
